name: ComicConCalendar
0:
”Alexa, ask ComicCon Calendar what events are happening on October 31st”
”Ask ComicCon Calendar to get me events for September 13th”
”Tell me about event one.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: comiccon calendar
des: ComicCon Calendar keeps you up to date on upcoming conventions, so that you don't have to risk missing out on a single one!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
